description.narrative: A. ADISCO needs to improve its knowledge and its evidence-based advocacy on the benefits of agroforestry and agroecology. These aretwo concept, especially agroecology, that have been recently included in the Government’s speech on agricultural strategy.This is the right time to collect evidence that what ADISCO has been doing for quite some time works and it is worth support with the Government, other donors, etc. The project, realised through Oxfam's discretionary funds, will finance a research-actionstudy on “agroforestry, sustainable use of biomass energy, conservation of soils through agroecology, livelihoods and poverty reduction”. A. ADISCO needs to improve its knowledge and its evidence-based advocacy on the benefits of agroforestry and agroecology. These are two concept, especially agroecology, that have been recently included in the Government’s speech on agricultural strategy.This is the right time to collect evidence that what ADISCO has been doing for quite some time works and it is worth support with the Government, other donors, etc. The project, realised through Oxfam's discretionary funds, will finance a research-actionstudy on “agroforestry, sustainable use of biomass energy, conservation of soils through agroecology, livelihoods and poverty reduction”.

participating-org.narrative:
Adisco (Appui au development intégral et á la Solidarité sur les colline) is a local NGO created in 2006. The institutional objective of Adisco is to bring to equilibrium the social forces and to contribute to the creation and development of a national social mouvement capable influencing policy making in favour of the most vulnerable.
Adisco works on five different themes/ fields of activities which are:
- The support of self-promition programme - Support of the development of the chains around specific agricultural products. - Support to the health « Mutuelle » (non for profit health insurance scheme) - Support to Entrepreneurship - Strengtheningof Africain civil society.
Lobby and Advocacy with other members of the civil society on health and agriculture related policies (nationally, on the level of EAC and internationally) as well as development and use of innovative credit schemes are some of the tools used in all the field of interventions.
Appui au Développement Intégral et à la Solidarité sur les Collines

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to social and political participation
